events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I paid for.
The case has been identified as related to a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
The support agent responsible for resolving refund requests has been assigned to this case.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to verify the issue and speed up the refund?
I have attached the order number 45321 and included pictures of the product I got, which is clearly different from what I bought on your website.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and send instructions for returning the wrong item at no cost.
I appreciate how quickly you’re handling this. The refund sounds good and I will send the item back as soon as I get the return label.
The refund process is now complete, and you should see the amount credited to your account within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Since we haven’t received any further concerns, we’re closing this case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day.
